resources.string: Please connect to the same WiFi network as your Forza game.
Please forward Forza\'s telemetry data to:
Note: If using SimHub, please instruct SimHub to forward telemetry data to the above Ip and Port!
There appears to be an error with your WiFi settings as we are unable to find the current WiFi address. Please ensure WiFi is enabled and the device is connected to the same network as Forza.
